SMALLHOLDING_INSERT: INSERT INTO smallholdings (size, ubication, shape, delimited) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
SMALLHOLDING_UPDATE: UPDATE smallholdings SET size = %s, ubication = %s, shape = %s, delimited = %s WHERE id = %s
CROP_INSERT: INSERT INTO crops (type, state, sow_date, harvest_date, storage_id, smallholding_id, quantity) values (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
CROP_UPDATE: UPDATE crops SET type = %s, state = %s, sow_date = %s, harvest_date = %s, storage_id = %s, smallholding_id = %s, quantity = %s WHERE id = %s
CROP_GROUPBY_DATE: SELECT YEAR(CURDATE()) AS year , m.month, IFNULL(c.crops, 0) AS crops FROM (SELECT 1 AS month UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS m LEFT JOIN (SELECT YEAR(harvest_date) AS year, MONTH(harvest_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS crops FROM crops WHERE YEAR(harvest_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) GROUP BY YEAR(harvest_date), MONTH(harvest_date)) AS c ON m.month = c.month
CROP_QUANTITY_UPDATE: UPDATE crops SET quantity = %s WHERE id = %s
STORAGE_INSERT: INSERT INTO storages (max_capacity, current_capacity, ubication, equipment) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
STORAGE_UPDATE: UPDATE storages SET max_capacity = %s, current_capacity = %s, ubication = %s, equipment = %s WHERE id = %s
DELIVERY_INSERT: INSERT INTO delivery (client_name, deliver_date, request_date, address) values (%s, %s, %s, %s)
DELIVERY_UPDATE: UPDATE delivery SET client_name = %s, deliver_date = %s, request_date = %s, address = %s WHERE id = %s
DELIVERY_GROUPBY_DATE: SELECT YEAR(CURDATE()) AS year , m.month, IFNULL(c.delivery, 0) AS deliveries FROM (SELECT 1 AS month UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS m LEFT JOIN (SELECT YEAR(deliver_date) AS year, MONTH(deliver_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS delivery FROM delivery GROUP BY YEAR(deliver_date), MONTH(deliver_date)) AS c ON m.month = c.month
DELIVERY_DETAILS_INSERT: INSERT INTO delivery_details (delivery_id, crop_id, quantity) values (%s, %s, %s)
DELIVERY_DETAILS_UPDATE: UPDATE delivery_details SET delivery_id = %s, crop_id = %s, quantity = %s WHERE id = %s
USER_UPDATE: UPDATE users SET email = %s, rol = %s WHERE id = %s
